HomePage.title: Transform Your Photos into Beautiful Prints
HomePage.description: Upload your photos and we'll enhance them using AI technology, creating stunning high-quality prints ready to be framed and displayed.

Upload.title: Upload Your Photo
Upload.description: Choose a photo to enhance and print. We accept JPG, PNG, and TIFF files up to 25MB.
Upload.dragDropTitle: Drag and drop your photo here
Upload.dragDropDescription: or click to select a file from your device
Upload.fileRequirements: Maximum file size: 25MB. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, TIFF

errors.fileType: Please select a JPG, PNG, or TIFF file
errors.fileSize: File size must be less than 25MB
errors.generic: There was an error with your file
